title: jvanname
author: jvanname
content: Um. Right now on the news, they are talking about how people at universities want to exterminate the Jews. That sounds like HITLER and NAZISM to me. Students at universities are some of the most horrendous entities imaginable. They should be sent to prison. All universities need to be converted to prisons in order to punish the students.Universities promote violence. They have promoted violence against me. There is no excuse. Your education is stupid.-Joseph Van Name Ph.D.
